desc: The Windows Surface is Microsoft first tabletâ€”and they stopped at nothing to make it a great experience. To really get the most out of it, however, it helps to understand how it actually works; let us help you get the most out of your new tablet.  This guide is designed to walk you through the most important parts of the tablet, from the basics to learning how to navigate through the tablet, to more advance features.
title: A Beginners Guide to Windows Surface: The Unofficial Guide to Using the Windows Surface and Windows 8 RT OS
